_comment: For Top K apps, should be able to choose chart type
name: top-k-app-chart
title: Top 15 Big Time Application

series.query: select appname, min(agg_perf_MB) as min_perf, avg(agg_perf_MB) as avg_perf, max(agg_perf_MB) as max_perf, sum(runtime)/3600 as total_runtime_h, sum(iotime)/3600 as total_iotime_h, sum(total_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024) as total_bytes_TB, count(*) as numjobs, avg(100*iotime/runtime) as avg_io_percentage, avg(agg_perf_MB/1024) as avg_perf_GB from jobs_info where agg_perf_MB is not null group by appname order by total_iotime_h desc limit 15;

query.select: appname, min(agg_perf_MB) as min_perf, avg(agg_perf_MB) as avg_perf, max(agg_perf_MB) as max_perf, sum(runtime)/3600 as total_runtime_h, sum(iotime)/3600 as total_iotime_h, sum(total_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024) as total_bytes_TB, count(*) as numjobs, avg(100*iotime/runtime) as avg_io_percentage, avg(agg_perf_MB/1024) as avg_perf_GB
